fields.title: Is the earth flat?
fields.content: Do some people believe the earth is flat, or is that just a myth?

fields.title: Is climate change real?
fields.content: Is the scientific consensus on climate change accurate, or is it a hoax?

fields.title: Is social media addictive?
fields.content: Are people addicted to social media, or is it just a harmless form of entertainment?

fields.title: Should college be free?
fields.content: Should college education be free for all, or should it remain a privilege for those who can afford it?

fields.title: Is artificial intelligence a threat to humanity?
fields.content: Is the development of artificial intelligence something to be feared, or is it just another tool to make life easier?

fields.title: Should the voting age be lowered to 16?
fields.content: Should 16-year-olds be allowed to vote in elections, or should the voting age remain at 18?

fields.title: Is homeschooling effective?
fields.content: Is homeschooling a viable alternative to traditional education, or does it limit a child's social development?

fields.title: Should the death penalty be abolished?
fields.content: Is the death penalty an effective deterrent to crime, or is it an outdated and barbaric practice that should be abolished?

fields.title: Is genetic engineering ethical?
fields.content: Is the genetic modification of humans and animals morally acceptable, or is it playing God?

fields.title: Should animal testing be banned?
fields.content: Is animal testing necessary for scientific research, or is it cruel and unnecessary?

fields.title: Is time travel possible?
fields.content: Is it possible to travel through time, or is it just science fiction?

fields.title: Should genetic cloning be legal?
fields.content: Should people be allowed to clone themselves or others, or is it unethical?

fields.title: Is the multiverse real?
fields.content: Does the multiverse theory have scientific merit, or is it just speculation?

fields.title: Is cryptocurrency the future of money?
fields.content: Is cryptocurrency a viable alternative to traditional forms of currency, or is it too risky?

fields.title: Should assisted suicide be legalized?
fields.content: Should people have the right to choose when and how they die, or is it morally wrong?

fields.title: Is nuclear power safe?
fields.content: Is nuclear power a safe and efficient source of energy, or is it too dangerous?

fields.title: Should the government regulate social media?
fields.content: Should the government have a role in regulating the content and behavior on social media platforms, or is it a violation of free speech?

fields.title: Is globalization good for the world?
fields.content: Does globalization lead to economic growth and development, or does it cause inequality and exploitation?

fields.title: Should the use of animals in entertainment be banned?
fields.content: Should animals be used for entertainment purposes, such as circuses and zoos, or is it unethical?

fields.title: Is renewable energy the solution to climate change?
fields.content: Can renewable energy sources, such as wind and solar, replace fossil fuels and mitigate climate change, or is it not feasible?
